[[Image:TheCorrs-group.jpg|right|thumb|250px|The Corrs in 2005. From left to right: Sharon, Caroline, Andrea and Jim.]]
 
This is a '''[[discography]] of [[The Corrs]]''', an [[Ireland|Irish]] [[folk rock]] band which consists of the Corr siblings: [[Andrea Corr|Andrea]], [[Sharon Corr|Sharon]], [[Caroline Corr|Caroline]] and [[Jim Corr]]. [[As of June 2008]], they have released five [[studio albums]], three [[compilation album|compilation albums]], one [[remix album]] and two [[live albums]], as well as six [[videos]] and 26 [[single (music)|singles]].
This is a '''[[discography]] of [[The Corrs]]''', an [[Ireland|Irish]] [[folk rock]] band which consists of the Corr siblings: [[Andrea Corr|Andrea]], [[Sharon Corr|Sharon]], [[Caroline Corr|Caroline]] and [[Jim Corr]]. [[As of June 2008]], they have released five [[studio albums]], three [[compilation album|compilation albums]], one [[remix album]] and two [[live albums]], as well as six [[videos]] and 26 [[single (music)|singles]].
